vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Τρυφῶσα, -ης, ἡ, ς, ἡ
Tryphosa: Rom.16:12 (see Lft., Phi., 175 f.).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.12
§ Tryphosa, "delicate"
Tryphosa, (Proper name), Rom. 16:12*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
土富撒 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "享樂"
一個女基督徒 (羅16:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
土富撒 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "享乐"
一个女基督徒 (罗16:12)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Try-phô-sơ; Try-phô-sa, một nữ tín đồ tại thành La-mã
